mapper.select: select distinct "dryConcreteWeight" from KANGYUAN.GARDENIAEXTRATION order by "dryConcreteWeight" asc
select distinct "content" from KANGYUAN.GARDENIAEXTRATION order by "content" asc
select distinct "batchNo" from KANGYUAN.GARDENIAEXTRATION order by "batchNo" desc

select * from KANGYUAN.GARDENIAEXTRATION where "dryConcreteWeight" >= #{minDryConcreteWeight} and "dryConcreteWeight" <= #{maxDryConcreteWeight} and "content" >= #{minContent} and "content" <= #{maxContent}
mapper.insert: insert into KANGYUAN.GARDENIAEXTRATION (batchNo, concentrationExtractionWeight, OriginalPH, HCLVolume, PHWithHCL, heatTreatmentTime, solidParaffinWeight, microBoilingTime, refrigerateTempreture, refrigerateTime, filterClothNum, extractionWeight, extractionTempreture, extractionVelocity, butanolWeight, butanolMaker, butanolBatchNo, cyclingButanol, cyclingStreamPressure, cyclingMaxTempreture, cyclingMinKPA, scraperEnrichmentMaxTempreture, scraperEnrichmentMinKPA, waterAdditionWeight, waterAdditionTimes, scraperTotleTime, concreteDensity, wetConcreteWeight, dryCustomTempreture, dryMaxTempreture, dryTime, dryKPA, dryConcreteWeight, content) values (#{batchno,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{concentrationextractionweight,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{originalph,jdbcType=FLOAT}, #{hclvolume,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{phwithhcl,jdbcType=FLOAT}, #{heattreatmenttime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{solidparaffinweight,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{microboilingtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{refrigeratetempreture,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{refrigeratetime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{filterclothnum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{extractionweight,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{extractiontempreture,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{extractionvelocity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{butanolweight,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{butanolmaker,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{butanolbatchno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cyclingbutanol,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{cyclingstreampressure,jdbcType=FLOAT}, #{cyclingmaxtempreture,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cyclingminkpa,jdbcType=FLOAT}, #{scraperenrichmentmaxtempreture,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{scraperenrichmentminkpa,jdbcType=FLOAT}, #{wateradditionweight,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wateradditiontimes,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{scrapertotletime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{concretedensity,jdbcType=FLOAT}, #{wetconcreteweight,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{drycustomtempreture,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{drymaxtempreture,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{drytime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{drykpa,jdbcType=FLOAT}, #{dryconcreteweight,jdbcType=FLOAT}, #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
